Welcome to the RStudio Professional Quickstart!

The RStudio Professional Quickstart VM includes evaluation versions of RStudio Professional products that are pre-installed and pre-configured to make it easy for you try them on your own machine.

Log in to RStudio Connect » Take a Tour of RStudio Connect »

RStudio Server Pro

Delivers productivity, security, metrics, and commercial support that professional data science teams need to develop at scale.

Log in » More info »

RStudio Connect

Push-button publishing and deployment of data products, including Shiny apps, R Markdown documents, and Plumber APIs.

Log in » More info »

RStudio Package Manager

Repository management server to organize and centralize R packages across your team, department, or entire organization.

Log in » More info »

Additional Information

Purchase RStudio Professional Products

For more information about running RStudio Professional products on your own enterprise infrastructure or details about pricing, please contact our sales team.

Documentation

Documentation for all RStudio products is available from our website or can be accessed within the products in the Quickstart.

Sample Mail Server

A sample mail server is available within the Quickstart to demonstrate RStudio Connect’s capability for sending automated, customized emails. In the Quickstart, all email from RStudio products is configured to be sent into a single mailbox. In an real-world installation, RStudio Products integrate securely with your email infrastructure to ensure that information remains private.

Support

Support is available for the Quickstart via the RStudio Community forums in the R-Admins category for questions with the “quickstart” tag. Please note that professional support is not available for the Quickstart.

Scope of Use

The Quickstart is primarily intended as a demo environment and is not supported for use in any production capacity. For more information about using RStudio Professional products on your own enterprise infrastructure, please contact our sales team.
